## ‚ö†Ô∏è Session Hygiene Rule

**Sessions older than 7 days must be reviewed:**

- If task is complete ‚Üí Archive to `docs/sessions/completed/`
- If task is still active ‚Üí Update status and continue
- If task is abandoned ‚Üí Move to `docs/sessions/abandoned/`

**On task completion, archive session in the SAME commit as your final code changes.**
